Message:
Ever since that day,
my travels found their purpose.

No more hidden villages.
I’ll find kindred spirits
and build a country where
we can live openly as witches...

Yes. In a manner of speaking,
I, the cunning Gil’uial,
was plotting a coup d’état.
Gehehe!

But you see,
the more witches I met,

the more it made me
realize just how many
misconceptions I had.

Take for instance,
one mighty witch who
hid her powers away,

and chose a life of peace
with her loved ones.

When I asked her
to explain herself,
what she told me was,
“You’ll understand one day.”
